site.title: Ruiru Mabati | Quality Roofing Sheets in Kenya
site.description: Ruiru Mabati Factory — Manufacturer and supplier of quality roofing sheets in Kenya. Box profile, corrugated and eurotile mabati. Kenya-wide delivery.

hero.heading: Premium Roofing Sheets • Direct From Factory
hero.alt: Roofing sheets from Ruiru Mabati Factory

about.title: About Us
about.text: Ruiru Mabati Factory is a trusted manufacturer of high-quality roofing sheets in Kenya. We supply premium iron sheets such as box profile, corrugated, and eurotile mabati. Our products come in various gauges, colors, and profiles to suit all types of construction projects.

products.name: Corrugated Mabati
products.details: Durable and affordable roofing sheets for all projects.

products.name: Eurotile Mabati
products.details: Elegant tile profile with premium coating.
